Event: Cancelled - HS Golf - Southwest Invite

div.p: The Art Department wants to extend a Huge Thank you to the Big Blue Boosters for their donation to the Art Department! With Big Blue Boosters help the art department will be able to purchase a clay mixer and screen printing supplies! We are so excited to use the new supplies!

A huge shout out to the Wallace Community Foundation Fund for donating over $5,600 to the Art Department for a new kiln, kiln, supplies, and wiring! We are so excited to use the kiln next school year for school and community projects!! Thank you so much for your support!!!

If you or someone you know could use assistance in these difficult times, Wallace School would like to help. Please let us know how we can. https://www.whscats.org/article/228679?org=wallace-public-school.

The Wallace FFA would like to give a HUGE shout out to Consolidated Telephone Company! They have made a donation to our chapter through the I Believe program! Along with that, they are also providing free internet to students that need to complete their schoolwork this semester!
2nd grade is ready for some sunshine. Virtual dress up—Hawaiian/Beach Day!
